    1: from pandas.core.window.ewm import (
    2:     ExponentialMovingWindow,
    3:     ExponentialMovingWindowGroupby,
    4: )
    5: from pandas.core.window.expanding import (
    6:     Expanding,
    7:     ExpandingGroupby,
    8: )

   10:     Rolling,
   11:     RollingGroupby,
   12:     Window,
   13: )
   14:

   16:     "Expanding",
